author: COMSOL
description: This is a 2D-example of how to model flow and heat transport in two types of glaciers: a cold glacier and a temperate glacier. It couples the non-Newtonian creeping ice flow with heat transport by conduction and convection. The sliding of the ice over the bedrock can also be taken into account.
label: glacier_flow_2d.mph
name: root
